item.description:
Min/Max: Min of 4, Max of 16 members

Guests: None. Members Only.

Event Fees: $2 event fee
Annual Members - FREE

Greens Fees - $10 per person
Additional fee of $8.50 to rent clubs

Details:

Hello Everyone -

Considering we were rained out our last attempt at Rockland, let's try again! Please join us for another fun filled 9 holes of golf at the Rockland Golf Course for a Saturday morning of play. Let's meet to T off at 10:30 meeting outside the pro shop Saturday, October 10th. As we've done in the past, we'll stagger the T times amongst the group about 10 minutes apart based upon the number of members that RSVP.

Everyone should arrive 10-15 mins prior to the T time to pay fees, assign groups, and for everyone to get started. If you intend to borrow/rent clubs, you can let the pro-shop know when you pay for your greens fees - club rentals are $8.50.

All members are welcome; however, it may be worth noting that the majority of the group are at the beginner level.

How many?

There is a minimum of 4 Participants (Non-organizers) by noon on Thursday, October 8th. No Guests for this meet-up as demand is high and space is limited.

Organizers: Susan (AO)

Please Note:

SSFMG and its organizers are not responsible for any injuries to participants or damage to equipment.

Weather Alternative:

None. This event will be canceled if it is raining or too foggy. We will do our best to cancel at least 6 hours in advance but we cannot control Mother Nature so we will do our best to notify everyone at least 3 hours prior to the event. Please do not change your RSVP based on weather forecasts. We check weather forecasts the night before and use those to determine if the event is canceled. Please check your email Friday night and Saturday morning for cancellation notices from the organizer to determine event status.

Carpool: There is no carpool for this event. Members should meet at the Braintree Municipal Golf Course. If you would like to carpool you may note where from in your RSVP comment and someone else may choose to contact you if they are also interested in carpooling.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions
item.how_to_find_us: In front of the pro shop

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: 9 Holes of Golf - Rockland Golf Course
